New paper by IPSL group comparing online fish vs. offline fish effect on plankton and carbon cycling: "High trophic level feedbacks on global ocean carbon uptake and marine ecosystem dynamics under climate change"
https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/gcb.16558
@Rémy Denéchère @Matt Long

Attaching the supplements and appendices for Petrik et al. 2019.
